storyInfo: The enemy's arrival brings great chaos and confusion, but fortunately, many passionate citizens team up with the L.G.D. to fight back the enemy. Behind the scenes, the true enemy has already bared her fangs, but in front of her stands the Catastrophe expert, Lava.

attributes.content: Act Two
Greetings
Drop your weapons and step back.
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: I said now!
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: These guys aren't even human. No need to show mercy!
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Do you copy? All targets in Sector 7 are confirmed to be 'Terracotta'!
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Are they really Reunion?
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: It's a diversion. Confirm their identity first.
attributes.name: Wei Fumizuki

attributes.content: Chief Wei! The situation has changed!
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: There's... there's more of them. Almost every squad on patrol has spotted Reunion elements!
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: A- another report of a brief spike in temperature in some areas of the city. What are the monitors doing?!
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer A

attributes.content: No reaction! But looking at the other numbers everything does seem normal...!
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer B

attributes.content: The enemy attacked as soon as our squad approached. They did not respond to any hails. We are unable to establish communication.
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer A

attributes.content: The enemy is scattered! They're weak, resistance is low, but there's lots of them!
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer B

attributes.content: Is this really Reunion?
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer A

attributes.content: The heat source is shifting. Find a way to track it!
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer B

attributes.content: There are no breaches in the city's defenses, they couldn't have gotten in——
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer A

attributes.content: Don't panic!
attributes.name: Wei Fumizuki

attributes.content: Summon even-numbered formations. Worst case scenario, engage the enemy in the city. Give priority to evacuating civilians.
attributes.name: Wei Fumizuki

attributes.content: The downtown area is densely populated, especially Temple Street. Have all police officers within that district focus on evacuations.
attributes.name: Wei Fumizuki

attributes.content: Contact the satellite cities to check if there are any breaches in the defensive lines, confirm the enemy's means of ingress, and hold firm.
attributes.name: Wei Fumizuki

attributes.content: Reunion should be long gone. We need to identify the enemy. Getting control of the situation is our main task. This is not the first time Lungmen has suffered an abnormal occurrence at New Year's. No need to panic.
attributes.name: Wei Fumizuki

attributes.content: Stand together. The L.G.D. has nothing to fear.
attributes.name: Wei Fumizuki

attributes.content: Right!
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Apologies, Amiya, Doctor. While you have only just arrived here in Lungmen, we have no time to offer you our hospitality.
attributes.name: Wei Fumizuki

attributes.content: Don't worry. Our agreement has been in effect since the moment Rhodes Island moored.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Please leave it to us. We'll assist the L.G.D.!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: W- what's with those things?
attributes.name: Lungmen Citizen A

attributes.content: They look familiar, but weren't they——?!
attributes.name: Lungmen Citizen A

attributes.content: Aiee! Over here too!
attributes.name: Lungmen Citizen B

attributes.content: Hey, get out of the way...!
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Th- thanks!
attributes.name: Lungmen Citizen A

attributes.content: Don't just stand there! Listen to the announcements and go to your designated evacuation zones!
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Keep to the main streets until you find the police. Hurry!
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: R- right!
attributes.name: Lungmen Citizen B

attributes.content: They don't talk. They don't bleed. It's like cutting into a sea sponge. Even their bodies disappear.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: 'Terracotta.' A fitting name.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Calling them 'Reunion' would cause unnecessary panic, Officer Ch'en. They are not flesh and blood people.
attributes.name: Wei Fumizuki

attributes.content: Understood. Urban districts secured.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Thank you for your efforts. Unfortunately, simply killing the enemy seems futile.
attributes.name: Wei Fumizuki

attributes.content: We've been unable to discern the true nature of the 'Terracottas,' but their strength has continued to grow over the past few hours.
attributes.name: Wei Fumizuki

attributes.content: It's hard to imagine at this scale, but could it be some kind of Arts?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: That's what's most troubling, our Originium reaction monitors are still unresponsive. But that proves this cannot be Reunion.
attributes.name: Wei Fumizuki

attributes.content: ...I'm absolutely sure of that.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: It's a disguise, just an illusion.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: But this image of Reunion strutting down the streets of Lungmen...
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: It's... disturbing.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: They are completely insulated against Originium. We had thought this impossible.
attributes.name: Wei Fumizuki

attributes.content: But it's happening. How did they infiltrate Lungmen?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Our conventional methods have failed. We have no indication of how the enemy 'appeared.'
attributes.name: Wei Fumizuki

attributes.content: It is as if they've been here all along, standing in silent ranks. Charging, routing, and charging again.
attributes.name: Wei Fumizuki

attributes.content: ...Just like the tide.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I'll prepare our defense in accordance with the contingency plan.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Be careful.
attributes.name: Wei Fumizuki

attributes.content: The L.G.D. can't afford to lose you.
attributes.name: Wei Fumizuki

attributes.content: Whoever their master is, they're just creating illusions. Other than causing a little chaos, is there any real threat to Lungmen?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: They go down in one hit.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: (These things are freaking me out.... If we don't move, they just stand there in those perfectly straight rows?)
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: (But they'll come rushing as soon as we pop our heads out.)
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: (Keep your voice down. They're very weak. Let's hurry up and find a way to get the jump on them.)
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: (——Wait, what are you doing?!)
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Hey, what are guys doing? Get back here!
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: ——No! You're not with us! Who are you?!
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: When did these things get in here?!
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Wh- what's with your face under your helmet?
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Why, what the hell are you?! Get away from me!
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: What's all the ruckus? The L.G.D. freaking out just 'cause they ran into an enemy that looks like them?
attributes.name: Madame Oni

attributes.content: Get up!
attributes.name: Madame Oni

attributes.content: R- right! I'm so sorry!
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: ...Wait, you're not Ch'en Sir. Who are you to give me orders?
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Just roll with it.
attributes.name: Madame Oni

attributes.content: Where is Ch'en Sir?
attributes.name: Madame Oni

attributes.content: She's is organizing a defensive line for the urban districts. She's going to block off the enemy and wipe them all out.
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: These things just popped out of nowhere. What makes her think that this would be the way to get rid of them all?
attributes.name: Madame Oni

attributes.content: This is what Chief Wei determined.
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: How am I supposed to trust your judgment when you're so on edge you're slipping up left and right?
attributes.name: Madame Oni

attributes.content: Ugh, I'm still dizzy.... Hey! One last question!
attributes.name: Madame Oni

attributes.content: I have no obligation to answer to the general public. The L.G.D. is here to follow Chief Wei's orders.
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: I just wanna ask, is the L.G.D. out there rumbling with people from Ursus, or like Yan folk from Jiangqi? Maybe some other heavy drinkers I'm forgetting?
attributes.name: Madame Oni

attributes.content: Or are you guys running around with hooch in those canteens instead of water?
attributes.name: Madame Oni

attributes.content: Uh.... I can't really answer that, and I really don't know....
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Ugh. I'm just trying to live down the shame of a certain Ch'en drinking me under the table.
attributes.name: Madame Oni

attributes.content: Pull yourself together! Do some stretches!
attributes.name: Madame Oni

attributes.content: We don't want the general public involved...
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Gah, my head... Gotta sober up... What did you just say?
attributes.name: Madame Oni

attributes.content: Erm. I said, well... I guess there's no need to turn down help from upstanding citizens....
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: We lost the heat source. Can't our instruments trace it?
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer A

attributes.content: No, no, no! Conventional monitoring doesn't work. It only uses temperature to determine a rough location, and with severe lag!
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer B

attributes.content: Receiving reports from all squads, the enemy appeared out of nowhere in the city. Still no trace of Originium Arts!
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer A

attributes.content: Let's rout them like we did before...
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer B

attributes.content: C- contact. The Terracottas are changing again, they—— they——
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer A

attributes.content: ...What happened?
attributes.name: Wei Fumizuki

attributes.content: Chief Wei! They've started learning to use weapons and, more importantly, contact with the enemy reveals unique traits in each individual....
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer A

attributes.content: It's as if they're really living people——
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer A

attributes.content: Impossible! Who could make such a realistic illusion? There must be a caster! Send out a scout team to find them!
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer B

attributes.content: They've taken out our equipment! You still think they're fake? They're not illusions, they're real!
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer A

attributes.content: But..... But this.... It doesn't make any sense at all!
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer B

attributes.options: What a mess.;......;Is there anything I can do to help?

attributes.content: ......Thank you for the kind words, but you need not trouble yourself.
attributes.name: Wei Fumizuki

attributes.content: You've dispatched Rhodes Island's operators to assist the L.G.D. in securing the urban districts, and that is the greatest of help to us.
attributes.name: Wei Fumizuki

attributes.content: Is Chief Wei here——? Ahem!
attributes.name: Snowsant

attributes.content: I'm sorry! I didn't mean to...! You, you're....
attributes.name: Snowsant

attributes.content: The leader of our partner organization, Rhodes Island Pharmaceuticals. I believe we can put it that way for now. 'Doctor' is the appropriate form of address.
attributes.name: Wei Fumizuki

attributes.content: S-s-s-s-so sorry, Doctor! And Chief Wei, what's going on outside?
attributes.name: Snowsant

attributes.content: All information on the 'Terracottas' has been disseminated to all members of the L.G.D. through the terminal.
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Oh, I'm sorry, I forgot there was such a thing...
attributes.name: Snowsant

attributes.content: It- it still isn't finding that heat source? This is very strange....
attributes.name: Snowsant

attributes.content: Uh oh.... Temperatures rising throughout Lungmen. We can't use thermal imaging. None of our instruments can detect the heat source itself——
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: We can't confirm that the 'Terracottas' are directly connected to the heat source. And it is likely that the defensive line will collapse if we reallocate manpower.
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Wouldn't it be better to look at it the other way around?
attributes.name: Snowsant

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Like, what if we took all the Originium-powered equipment in the city and turned it to max, then look for wherever we *don't* detect an Originium reaction...?
attributes.name: Snowsant

attributes.content: S- sorry, I was out of line. This isn't really my wheelhouse....
attributes.name: Snowsant

attributes.content: No... That's just crazy enough to work! Hey, how much equipment does the L.G.D. have the authority to deploy directly?
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer A

attributes.content: It's a lot more if you include civilian ones.
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer B

attributes.content: But if we have to overload everything, all of Lungmen will be paralyzed by the time we find the heat source...
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer A

attributes.content: Paralyzed...? What kind of damages are we talking about?
attributes.name: Snowsant

attributes.content: I don't know. Tens of millions?
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Maybe we'd b-b-b-better not do it...
attributes.name: Snowsant

attributes.content: No. Just do it.
attributes.name: Wei Fumizuki

attributes.content: Nian sightings have become less and less common since the development of nomadic city technology. We have not had the opportunity to study the 'Nian'.
attributes.name: Wei Fumizuki

attributes.content: The L.G.D. will do whatever it takes to uncover the secret of the 'Nian,' even if it's just the tip of the iceberg.
attributes.name: Wei Fumizuki

attributes.content: I trust Snowsant's judgment.
attributes.name: Wei Fumizuki

attributes.content: Thanks, but, but shouldn't we make careful projections before....
attributes.name: Snowsant

attributes.content: ——! Sector 4's line has been breached! I can't raise the team leader!
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer A

attributes.content: Other lines have engaged! There are too many enemies!
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer A

attributes.content: All teams, keep the airwaves clear at all times. Repeat, all teams, keep the waves clear!
attributes.name: L.G.D. Comms Officer

attributes.content: Dynamic codes will be sent to team leaders every ten minutes! Use these to identify yourselves!
attributes.name: L.G.D. Comms Officer

attributes.content: Damn it, if it's not one thing it's another.
attributes.name: Frivolous L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Stop complaining! The rest of you, form up! Get the wounded back. Don't let them break through that barricade!
attributes.name: Serious L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Ugh, that really brings back some bad memories.
attributes.name: Frivolous L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: They're getting tougher. But they're no Reunion. And we beat Reunion.
attributes.name: Serious L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Regroup!
attributes.name: Serious L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: No... You- You...
attributes.name: Frivolous L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: You're..... you're supposed to be dead....
attributes.name: Frivolous L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: That's a fake, you moron! It's not that Infected. Come on!
attributes.name: Serious L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: C- Captain!
attributes.name: Frivolous L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Don't be *Lungmen profanity* stupid. They're all fakes! All of them!
attributes.name: Serious L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: I know, I know, I know! But to see them again, all of a sudden like this, I——
attributes.name: Frivolous L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: You again?! I just killed you a second ago!
attributes.name: Serious L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: None of you have any issues to work out with your colleagues? This is a great opportunity! Dig in your heels and give 'em hell!
attributes.name: Serious L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: This is as far back as we go. Are you going to let them into L.G.D. HQ?!
attributes.name: Serious L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Yes!
attributes.name: Frivolous L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Lungmen Guard Department
Chief Wei! We've found an anomalous area on thermal imaging.
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: We've got a lock on the heat source! It worked!
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: But we're out of time... Some of the targets have breached our defensive lines!
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Re- report! We're getting distress signals from multiple teams!
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Where's Officer Ch'en?
attributes.name: Wei Fumizuki

attributes.content: Officer Ch'en met up with Rhodes Island operator Amiya and are currently engaging the enemy approaching the L.G.D.!
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.options: You sure you don't need any help?;Why don't you let me give you a hand?

attributes.content: ...Chief Wei?
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Lungmen trusts the Doctor's abilities, and since Rhodes Island operators have joined the fight, the Doctor should enjoy command authority equal to that of Officer Ch'en.
attributes.name: Wei Fumizuki

attributes.content: We'll leave it to the Doctor.
attributes.name: Wei Fumizuki

attributes.content: The enemy moving outside the containment zones will harm the civilian population, we have to——
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Wait, we've picked up a strong Originium reaction.... a sandstorm? This, this is——
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Special transmission incoming! It- it's Inspector Lin!
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Hasn't Old Lin been retired for seven or eight years?! What's he saying?
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: He- he said he tossed all the enemies who slipped out of containment into a dumpster...
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: And, he still has a message for Chief Wei....
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: ...Officer Lin is a hero of the L.G.D. and we should respect his opinion.
attributes.name: Wei Fumizuki

attributes.content: Yes!
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Big Wei, how are the greenhorns? Is this how they're doing things? Why not make a special dispensation, throw me and Little Wei into the ring and I promise we'll have this done in under ten minutes..
attributes.name: Retiree

attributes.content: ........Chief Wei?
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: ........Heh, I miss those days, when we were all young.
attributes.name: Wei Fumizuki

attributes.content: But the L.G.D. hasn't fallen so far that we need to rely on those two. Contact Officer Ch'en, and let us trouble the Doctor to command the Rhodes Island operators.
attributes.name: Wei Fumizuki

attributes.content: Time to fight back.
attributes.name: Wei Fumizuki

attributes.content: I told you the New Year's couplets you wrote were inauspicious. Just now I saw several faces who should not be alive.
attributes.name: Retiree

attributes.content: That's my fault now? And how many times have I told you not to use those old pet names in front of the men?
attributes.name: Mr. Wei, Ordinary Citizen

attributes.content: Who is it who wears the pants around here?
attributes.name: Retiree

attributes.content: Right. That's why *she's* Big Wei.
attributes.name: Retiree

attributes.content: Whatever. So what do we do now?
attributes.name: Mr. Wei, Ordinary Citizen

attributes.content: Well, I never thought I'd live to see another Nian.
attributes.name: Retiree

attributes.content: Reminiscing about our days on the force?
attributes.name: Mr. Wei, Ordinary Citizen

attributes.content: No. And my daughter isn't even home. There's no point in heading back there.
attributes.name: Retiree

attributes.content: Let's see what they've got in store this time around. No matter who we've become, our duty to protect the people hasn't changed.
attributes.name: Retiree

attributes.content: ...Nng... I can't feel my arms... Shit...
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: These things, why do I feel like they're getting stronger....?
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: What's going on? Why are these people charging us without so much as a word?
attributes.name: Ally of Justice #1

attributes.content: I think you've got it a bit twisted, Waai Fu. I'm afraid these aren't quite 'people,' you know?
attributes.name: Back-Alley Doctor

attributes.content: They're more like ghosts, or something?
attributes.name: Back-Alley Doctor

attributes.content: G- ghosts or whatever wouldn't go down this easy, would they?
attributes.name: Ally of Justice #1

attributes.content: Legend has it that as the New Year approaches, all kinds of monsters will come out to plague the people. Could be something like that.
attributes.name: Full-time Security Guard

attributes.content: Monsters can be seen and touched! Ghosts can't!
attributes.name: Ally of Justice #1

attributes.content: You say that, but he vanished right as you kicked him...
attributes.name: Full-time Security Guard

attributes.content: Huh? Where are you pulling us all of a sudden? And you're looking kind of stiff, Waai Fu.
attributes.name: Back-Alley Doctor

attributes.content: Take heart.
attributes.name: Ally of Justice #1

attributes.content: You civilians should be in your designated evacuation zone. It isn't safe here!
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: You're hurt, Ah Sir. Your right arm is broken and you've lost a lot of blood. It's at least an hour and a half walk from here to the L.G.D. Can you handle it?
attributes.name: Back-Alley Doctor

attributes.content: Ugh.... I'm fine....
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Aak, you better not...
attributes.name: Full-time Security Guard

attributes.content: If I might speak freely, I come from a long line of doctors. And since childhood I have taken it upon myself to save lives and care for the wounded. Whenever I encounter some excitement on the street, I always rush to see if I can be of aid——
attributes.name: Back-Alley Doctor

attributes.content: W- what are you doing?
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: ——Stopping your bleeding, dressing the wound, applying anaesthetic, giving you a whole new lease on life.
attributes.name: Back-Alley Doctor

attributes.content: That last one sounds a bit overboard.
attributes.name: Full-time Security Guard

attributes.content: It's under control. Come now, Ah Sir, how often do you get a shot at free health care?
attributes.name: Back-Alley Doctor

attributes.content: I really appreciate it, but there's something off about y——OW! Hands off! Hey!
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: What was that drug? Are you licensed? Show me your papers, or else——
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: ——Ah.
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Heh, heh? The pain's actually gone...?
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: And what's that fruity smell....?
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: The new stuff is watermelon flavored. Congratulations on being the first to try it!
attributes.name: Back-Alley Doctor

attributes.content: Why would you have watermelon flavored injections?
attributes.name: Full-time Security Guard

attributes.content: Honestly, the pain relief is just a placebo effect. Your bleeding has stopped, and you'll certainly have no trouble returning to the L.G.D. in one piece.
attributes.name: Back-Alley Doctor

attributes.content: Once there, do remember to get formal medical treatment, as a simple debridement will not solve the problem, and there is no way to know what substance caused the wound.
attributes.name: Back-Alley Doctor

attributes.content: ........Did you just admit you're informal?
attributes.name: Full-time Security Guard

attributes.content: This is an emergency!
attributes.name: Back-Alley Doctor

attributes.content: Let's get you up, Ah Sir. You're all right.
attributes.name: Back-Alley Doctor

attributes.content: I really do feel all right...
attributes.name: Watermelon-scented L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Thank you very much, and I'll report this assistance to my superiors when the battle is over!
attributes.name: Watermelon-scented L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: No, no, no, let's not go reporting things. Safe travels, Ah Sir. Take care!
attributes.name: Back-Alley Doctor

attributes.content: ...What a weirdo.
attributes.name: Watermelon-scented L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Whew! And that's my good deed for the day!
attributes.name: Back-Alley Doctor

attributes.content: Experimental Epinephrine Reagent No. 3.... Effective..... No short-term adverse effects.... Continuous observation.... Smells of watermelon, origin unknown.... And that's that!
attributes.name: Back-Alley Doctor

attributes.content: Origin unknown?
attributes.name: Ally of Justice #1

attributes.content: Tried it, it worked, it didn't kill anyone, that's what I call good medicine!
attributes.name: Back-Alley Doctor

attributes.content: Good thing it worked, or we'd have to knock you out and hand you over to the L.G.D. to calm things down.
attributes.name: Ally of Justice #1

attributes.content: Those ghosts are making trouble all over the place. Is that why Mr. Lee had us out on the street all of a sudden?
attributes.name: Full-time Security Guard

attributes.content: I definitely don't want to give up the streets to them, but if it's g-g-g-ghosts.... What can you do? You can't punch or kick them.
attributes.name: Ally of Justice #1

attributes.content: But you just——
attributes.name: Back-Alley Doctor

attributes.content: You can't fight a ghost with your fists! It can't be done! No way! I can't do it!
attributes.name: Ally of Justice #1

attributes.content: You were doing that literally two minutes ago...
attributes.name: Back-Alley Doctor

attributes.content: Well, I've been short of work lately, so why not just leave them to make some patients?
attributes.name: Back-Alley Doctor

attributes.content: Like a bicycle repairman who leaves nails out on the street.
attributes.name: Back-Alley Doctor

attributes.content: Keep going down the path of wickedness and you'll get what's coming to you.
attributes.name: Full-time Security Guard

attributes.content: I'm not worried. I know far too many happy, healthy people who've earned a comeuppance. My turn is a long way off.
attributes.name: Back-Alley Doctor

attributes.content: By the way, Hung, aren't you curious about the 'Nian'?
attributes.name: Back-Alley Doctor

attributes.content: I just want everyone to be safe and sound.
attributes.name: Full-time Security Guard

attributes.content: You're! So! Dull! What about Waai Fu? Want to sneak into the containment zone and take a look?
attributes.name: Back-Alley Doctor

attributes.content: I won't stop you, but I'll tell Mr. Lee all about it.
attributes.name: Ally of Justice #1

attributes.content: Don't you want to go toe to toe with a literal legend? Bam! Pow! Bang! Uppercut! I've heard the Nian is a tough, bloodthirsty demon. One you can actually see and touch!
attributes.name: Back-Alley Doctor

attributes.content: Ah. And if you defeat the Nian, your old man, in pursuit of the ultimate truth of martial arts, would finally be willing to fight you. And then, at long last, father and daughter communicate with their fists, reconciling once and for all! What a beautiful story....
attributes.name: Back-Alley Doctor

attributes.content: Hey, Waai Fu, I was just kidding, don't be like that.... Wait, Waai Fu, where are you going...? Oh, no! Hung! Stop her!
attributes.name: Back-Alley Doctor

attributes.content: ——Mom?
attributes.name: Child

attributes.content: Mister.... Have you seen my mom?
attributes.name: Child

attributes.content: Mister?
attributes.name: Child

attributes.content: ——Mmh, hot!
attributes.name: Child

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Child

attributes.content: Lady, where did that man go?
attributes.name: Child

attributes.content: It's probably not a good idea to let a guy like that, silent and armed to the teeth, around kids, huh?
But Mom told me to find a policeman if I got lost...
attributes.name: Child

attributes.content: You don't have to do everything your mom says.
But...
attributes.name: Child

attributes.content: No buts, little one. We've got the battle of the century going on out here. You run along and play somewhere else.
Um, okay.... Thank you, lady!
attributes.name: Child

attributes.content: What a good kid.
Hmmm...?
Isn't a sweet little show like that supposed to make you think, 'Oh, maybe she's not so bad,' and lower the dagger?
Is one woman supposed to be able to wear out the entire L.G.D.?
I'm not one to mince words, so let's get right to it. You're no ordinary warrior. What's your name?
Lava.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: What's with people these days? That can't be your name. It's too weird.
It's my codename.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: That's kind of a pain. What's the difference between a name and a codename anyway? Is it really so important to express your identity as an independent organism?
You're the one who asked!
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Besides, there's no way you could understand us, 'Nian'.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Wow, you recognized me right away.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: That's what they used to call me, but I don't think 'Nian' is cool enough. Can we change it? I want a badass codename like 'Lava.'
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: ...You won't get away, the L.G.D. can track you.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: I don't have to run. Come, Tinmen.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: This is the weapon you took from the Lungmen central database.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: What can you do with such weak illusions?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Oooh - you cut through the air with a dagger? I've never seen Arts like that before. Pretty badass!
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Thanks for the compliment. Should I teach you?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Ho ho ho——not bad.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: I didn't expect to see a massive moving metropolis. You people have some tricks up your sleeves.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: And your Arts, well, I've never seen such a skillful and practical approach before.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: It's a relief. I was afraid you wouldn't have made much progress.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: You used the data in those records to create illusions of Reunion and the L.G.D.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Your power is not like Originium Arts, but you can't fool me. Now that I have you figured out, the monsters that have plagued Lungmen for centuries will be no more.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: You're a smart cookie. Where'd you come up with this stuff?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: I've been combing ancient records and modern papers in a quest to understand you.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Huh? So all the years I've been sleeping, you've been cramming trivia about me?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Pretty much.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: I was born and bred to hunt your kind.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Wha? So you're like, a fan of mine?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: ...If wanting to kill you counts.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: I never thought I'd meet someone like you.... before I forgot myself.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Oh, honey, I'm touched. I'm on the verge of tears here. It's like I'm a forgotten has-been meeting an old fan. How about it? Why don't we call a truce and go get a drink?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Since we're waiting for the Tinmen to overpower the... oh, what are they called again...? That's right! Since we're waiting for the Tinmen to beat down the L.G.D., we might as well find something to pass the time.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: ...According to the records, it's been decades since you last attacked Lungmen.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: You have no idea what we're capable of now, and you're still so sure of yourself?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: What are you capable of? You've got taller buildings, a bit more metal in your machines, and your hot pot tastes worse...
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: What should I be worrying about? What else can you show me?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: You seem to be looking forward to it.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: That I am.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: You'll see. Let's call it... divination.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: They're allowing divination these days? Time was, a commoner would be put to death for seeking knowledge of the heavens.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: If divination's a crime, then I'm guilty as charged.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: You....
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: I'm even more curious about you. You sure you don't want that drink?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Then make those things stop.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Is this like a 'surrender now and I'll let you live' thing?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: I care more about the truth than fighting you.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: The truth? What do you want to know? Seeing as we're so in tune with each other, I might consider telling you.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Your goal. And how to defeat all of you once and for all.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: All of us?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Nian is only your name. The Catastrophe is far more than just you, I know that well.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: What are you going to do when you know the answer? Still going to be all fighty-killy?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Yeah. Maybe. If your true form can actually be killed.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: (There's a change in her attitude... A pressure in the air...)
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Hey, li'l Lava.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Don't call me that. We're not friends.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Don't say that, you really surprised me, you've learned a lot more than I ever expected.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: You're right, you know. At first, I wasn't planning to do anything to this city. As far as I was concerned, you were weak little folk, gradually making your way in the world.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: But I have to admit, you made some real progress over the years.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: And to think someone's actually been watching us all this time. That's a pleasant surprise.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: You left behind horror stories and monster myths in every corner of the world. How could we not look for you?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Sometimes it was a giant, sometimes it was an army, sometimes it was Arts like a Catastrophe...
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: But we always grew stronger, in order to survive.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: What I don't understand is how the people of ancient Yan fought with spears and halberds, while Lungmen today has huge cannons to protect the city, and in the end they all suffered the same fate?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Were you going easy back then? Or are you stronger now?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Or——
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: You need juuust the right amount of destruction and mayhem to make a point.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Isn't this fun? I wake up to find that the little ones who haven't changed in years are suddenly so close to the truth.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: I think it's time to take off the kid gloves and bump up the difficulty.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: You won't get away with it.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Ooh, fire——?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: So the dagger was just an opening act. The staff is the headliner?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: You people have never been willing to use your power efficiently. And that's one thing that hasn't changed.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: A shield...?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: I've never seen anything like it before. And it's suppressing the range of my Originium Arts, how did she do that...?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Hey! Originium Arts? That sounds pretty badass!
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: (But my flames just now... She used her power specifically to block them?)
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: (Spatial Arts are trickier.... but...)
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: But I do have one teensy little question. How did you come up with all this stuff while I, or I guess 'we,' were snoozing away?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: No comment.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Is that right?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Let's change the subject then. A minute ago, you said my power was to use data to do up those toy soldiers.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Sorry, but that's a swing and a miss. How could I figure out something so complicated so quickly?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Turns out, you break stuff down into its simplest parts, language, Arts, anything, and it's all pretty much the same.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: And the best possible material I could find was that data. Your past enemies, your fears and anxieties. It's perfect for having a little fun.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Think of it like blowing bubbles in the park.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: ...What are you trying to say?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: When you said you had me figured out, I got this warm, tingly feeling.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: I wonder if it's true.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: You're...
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: How... The top of that building... it's melting?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Relax. All the people are gone.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: ...What are you going to do?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Smelt. Cast. Temper.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: This city will make the perfect forge.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Li'l Lava, don't you think you'd make a good blacksmith?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Who wants to be a blacksmith?!
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: (Hrm, it's just like in those theses. They were so out there, I never thought they could be true. But the Nian can pull off some incredible feats without using Arts, in the traditional sense.)
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: (Now, just like the conclusions of those papers... I have to try this.)
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Oh? The dagger slices through the air and compresses it. Is this how you use those Originium Arts?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: None of the records or studies give any indication of your true form. It took long enough to determine that you were actually a communal organism rather than a single individual.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: But that begs the question, why am I standing here?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Cover your ears, Nian.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Ugh.... That noise...!
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: 'The heart of the crucible is... nothing but straw!'
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Gah——That's——
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Never thought I'd see you cowering.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Who the hell are you?! How do you know about that——
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Ahhhh.... No... I know all too well who's behind this...
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Shit. How much did Hsi tell the humans——
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Surprised?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Countless researchers have spent countless years going over every record they could get their hands on, and still not one could find even a shred of hope to combat the Nian.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: But there are many ancient legends in the land of Yan, and the ones that don't concern you have interesting bits to them.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Legends?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Old folk sayings like 'the din of fireworks rings in the new year' and such.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Ahhh....
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: So that's how it is.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: I guess these things turn into legends to be passed down through the centuries, even if you don't understand their true meaning.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: In a world plagued by Catastrophe, you find a way to keep things going. Isn't that nice?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: I'll put a little more thought into it.... Let's build something a bit less boring.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: She closed her eyes?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Wait, she's taking something out of her mouth... it's... a sword?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Slow on the uptake. And don't distract me. What if I choke?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: The spatial Arts... you cut it open?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Is that so surprising? Just cut right into it. You can't do that?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: *Sigh*. Never enough respect for the time-honored crafts. Always after some kind of boring old embroidered pillow or whatever.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Then let's have you feel the weight of history.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Guh!
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Oh, sorry. Was that too heavy for you? Hey! Are you still alive?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: So this is the power of the 'Nian,' huh? I'm not impressed.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Come on, that was pretty hard, wasn't it? Don't try to act tough here.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: It's fine. I already know how to beat you. Aren't you at least a little shocked?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: If nothing else because I'm actually putting up a fight?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: ...Ha. I think someone's getting too big for her tattered britches.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: ——The ground, no, the world is shaking. Does this city mean anything to you?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: It's overkill, isn't it? Just to deal with you?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: I'm only trying to see the best you humans have come up with. And passing the time, I guess.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: How long can you keep fighting? Ten minutes? An hour? A whole day?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Until I unravel the mystery of your trickery.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: You're dreaming! How can a simpleton like you perceive that which is beyond your world?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: She pointed to the sky...?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: 'Heavenly forge, take the bounty of the earth and smelt an edge to slice the sky!'
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Arise!
attributes.name: Nian
